posts.post_title: n172 HOFer Mickey Welch SGC 10 available
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen
graded a 10 for corner wear and surface wear along the right edge.  Writing on the back however the back is free from damage.  Otherwise a terrific photo with great clarity for one of the toughest HOFers in the set.

$925 delivered....
